1.SceneDescription:
Monica, Chandler, and Phoebe's, Chandler is on the phone, Rachel and Monica are
sitting in the kitchen.

lines.Line: Buh-bye. (Hangs up the phone) I just got us reservations at Michelle’s and tickets to the Musicman to celebrate our first holiday season as a betroughed couple
Haaaa... (Puts the skull on the table) ... ahhhh

No, no, no. It's not! It's not my mom. It belonged to mom. Yeah, no, she
used to put it out every Christmas to remind us, that even though it's Christmas, people
still die. And, you can put candy in it. (She grabs the skull, pulls out a stick of
licorice, and takes a bite.

(Thinking it over) Sure! (Takes one) Hey, I just found out, I get Ben for
the holidays this year
Are you gonna dress up as Santa

Nope. I mean, I know Susan does every year, but I think I wanna take this
year to teach him all about Hanukkah

And maybe I could teach Ben about the Christmas skull and how people
die
You may need to use this year to teach Ben about Phoebe
You may need to use this year to teach Ben about Phoebe

lines.Character: (Joey comes out of the bathroom reading a newspape
lines.Line: Joey comes out of the bathroom reading a newspaper
(to Monica) Did you know he was in there
How long have we been home

2.SceneDescription: Joey and Rachel’s, Joey is sitting behind a red drum set.

lines.Line:
Hey! Great, you’re home! Guess what Phoebe got me for Christmas!
(Starts drumming.

3.SceneDescription: Ross's apartment, Ross is whirling Ben around.

lines.Line:
Wooooooo, hehehe. Hey, ahh, you don't feel like you're gonna throw up, do
ya

Well, I do, so let's... (Ben and Ross sit down on the couch) So, Ben, you
uh, you know what holiday is coming up, don't ya
Yep, and you know what other holiday is coming up

Yes, but also (Pauses to let Ben answer, but he doesn’t.) Hanukkah!
See, you're part Jewish, and-and Hanukkah is a Jewish holiday
Santa has reindeers that can fly
Santa has reindeers that can fly

Right, um, but, on Hanukkah, Hanukkah is a celebration of a miracle. See,
years and years ago there were these people called the Maccabees
(interrupts him) Okay, that's right, yes, but on Hanukkah, uh, we sing, uh (Sings) Draydl, draydl, draydl, I made you out of clay
(interrupts him again) Okay, it's not a contest
(interrupts him again) Okay, it's not a contest

Well, how about this year, instead of Santa, we have fun celebrating
Hanukkah
No! Oh, no-no-no. Hey, you weren't bad, you've been very good, Ben

No, hey-hey, come on, (He grabs Ben and sits him on his lap) Ben, Santa is
not mad at you, okay? Hey, you're-you're his favorite little guy

4.SceneDescription:
The Hallway, Phoebe comes up the stairs and hears drumming coming from Joey and
Rachel's, so she enters smiling and then sees that Rachel, not Joey, is the one playing.

lines.Line:
So you like the drums! That's, that's great! Y’know, I was worried,
that, you know, they would maybe an unbearable living situation. All right, okay, well,
apparently not! So, yay

Hey-hey, Pheebs, check it out, we already learned a song. (To Rachel)
Ready? One, two, three, four..

lines.Character:
[Rachel hits some tom-toms and ends up on the 'crash'-cymbal, which is in fact a
ride-cymbal, but whatever..
lines.Line:
Rachel hits some tom-toms and ends up on the 'crash'-cymbal, which is in fact a
ride-cymbal, but whatever...

5.SceneDescription:
Joey and Rachel's, Joey is sitting behind the drums wearing safety goggles,
hitting them with his sticks as Rachel watches.

lines.Line:
Joey, y’know that you could just not throw the sticks up in the
air
What is Rock 'n' Roll about that

(entering with an aquarium covered by a towel) Hey, Joey, I got you
another present. (She puts it on the counter

Oh wait, before you tell me what it is! (He plays a drum-roll) Okay, what
is it

It's a…tarantula! (Joey almost falls down from his drum-stool
jumping up) Oh! God! Rachel, look, I'm sorry. What was I thinking giving Joey this big,
gross, scary spider in such a poorly constructed cage

What are you talking about? I love them! (Looks into the cage) Yeah, I
had a tarantula when I was a kid. But it-it died, because my cat ate it. And then, then my
cat died. But Joey, isn't this cool

Is it on me? I feel, I feel like it's on me! I got, hey! (He storms into
his room

Is it on me? I feel, I feel like it's on me! I got, hey! (He storms into
his room
Oh, isn't that adorable? Joey is afraid of the tarantula

(sarcastic) Ah, yeah, he's so adorable, God, he's just so much fun, Joey
is the best, I'm glad you're having so much fun here. (She turns around, about to leave
What? Wait-wait a minute, what? Phoebe, what's the matter
What? Wait-wait a minute, what? Phoebe, what's the matter
And that makes you angry because
Because you would rather live here with Joey
Because you would rather live here with Joey

Monica and Chandler said that you were having so much fun here. And
apparently no amount of drums or tarantulas is gonna change that

Did you get all this stuff for Joey to try and drive me out of the
apartment? Honey, if you wanted to do that, you might as well just gotten him a fish, you
know how fish freaked me out

It wouldn't have mattered anyway, Phoebe, you and I are, are gonna live
together, we're roommates; that's the deal

Yes, but I wanted you to want to live with me, but okay, if you're
having so much fun over here
Oh, it's so much more fun with you
Oh, it's so much more fun with you
We did have fun, didn't we
We did have fun, didn't we
Oh, anyway, they say, if we want, we can see it tonight

Good, good, good, good, good. (She runs to the drums and gets the
sticks
Great, all right, okay, and Monica ask me to make the drumming stop

(with the sticks in her hands) Um... (She goes to the tarantula-cage and
puts the sticks into it) Done

6.SceneDescription:
Monica, Chandler, and Phoebe's, Monica has just opened the door for Ross who is
costumed as an Armadillo. Ben is standing next to her.

lines.Line:
I'm the holiday armadillo! I'm a friend of Santa's and he sent me here to
wish you (Points to Ben) a Merry Christmas
What happened to Santa, Holiday Armadillo
(to Monica) Santa was unavailable so close to Christmas

Wow, come in, have a seat. You must be exhausted coming all the way
from…Texas

That's right, Ben. I'm Santa's representative for all the southern states.
And Mexico! But, Santa sent me here to give you these presents, Ben. (He tries to bend
down to pick up the bag with the presents, but can't because of the costume) Maybe the
Lady will help me with these presents

lines.Character:
[Monica picks up the bag, while Ross closes the door and hits Monica with his tail.
They walk into the living room, and Monica empties the bag
lines.Line:
Monica picks up the bag, while Ross closes the door and hits Monica with his tail.
They walk into the living room, and Monica empties the bag.
You're welcome, Ben. Merry Christmas, ooh, and Happy Hanukkah
Are you for Hanukkah, too? Because I'm part-Jewish
Because Armadillos also wandered in the desert

(to Monica) You wanna wander in the hall? (to Ben) Ooh, hey Ben, what if
the Holiday Armadillo told you all about the Festival of Lights

lines.Character: [Monica and Ben sit down on the couch
lines.Line: Monica and Ben sit down on the couch.
Years and years ago there were these people called the Maccabees..
(entering in a Santa costume) Ho, ho, ho! Merry Christmas
Santa! (Runs to Chandler and hugs him
Santa! (Runs to Chandler and hugs him
Hey! (Grunts as Ben hits him at full speed.
What are you doing here, Santa
What are you doing here, Santa

Well, I'm here to see my old buddy Ben. What are you doing here,
weird…turtle-man

I'm the Holiday Armadillo, your part-Jewish friend. You sent me here to
give Ben some presents. Remember
Did you bring me any presents, Santa

You bet I did, Ben, put it there! (He shakes Ben's hand, but the money
falls out of his hands) (to Monica) Well, it would have worked this time, if his hands
weren't so damn small! (Realizes, that Ben is standing right there) Ho, ho, ho

Okay Ben, why don't you come open some more presents, and Santa, the
Armadillo, and I have a little talk in the kitchen? There's a sentence, I never thought
I'd say

lines.Character: [They walk to the kitchen; everyone is lowering their voice
lines.Line: They walk to the kitchen; everyone is lowering their voices

lines.Character: [They walk to the kitchen; everyone is lowering their voice
lines.Line: They walk to the kitchen; everyone is lowering their voices

You called everyone and said you were having trouble finding a Santa
costume, so I borrowed one from a guy at work
Thank you, but, but you gotta leave
Thank you, but, but you gotta leave

Because, I'm finally getting him excited about Hanukkah, and, and
you're-you’re wrecking it
But I didn't get to shake my belly like a bowl full of jelly
I'm sorry, Chandler but this, this is really important to me
Fine, I'll give the suit back
Fine, I'll give the suit back

lines.Character: [Ross turns around and walks back to Ben
lines.Line: Ross turns around and walks back to Ben.

lines.Character: [Ross turns around and walks back to Ben
lines.Line: Ross turns around and walks back to Ben.

(to Chandler) Hey, you think, you can keep it another night? (She has a
really teasing look on her face and keeps twirling Chandler's beard.
Did your Dad ever dress up like Santa
Okay Ben, Santa has to go. Say good-bye
Okay Ben, Santa has to go. Say good-bye
No! Why does he have to go

Because, if Santa and the Holiday…Armadillo? (Ross nods) ...are
ever in the same room for too long the universe will implode. Merry Christmas
No! Why can't the Armadillo leave? I want Santa
No! Why can't the Armadillo leave? I want Santa
Fine, I-I give up. Santa, Santa can stay

Well, I'll stay, but only because I wanna hear about Hanukkah. Ben,
will you sit here with Santa and learn about Hanukkah

Ross mouths to Chandler, "Thank you," and he mouths, "You’re
welcome," back.

All right, it's time for the story of Hanukkah. Years and years ago, there
were these people called the Maccabees

7.SceneDescription: Monica, Chandler, and Phoebe's, Santa (Chandler), Superman (Joey), Ben, and Monica are listening to the Holiday Armadillo (Ross) finish telling the story of Hanukkah.

lines.Line:
…and the miracle was that that little bit of oil that should’ve
just lasted just one day, burned for

That’s right, and that’s why we celebrate Hanukkah today. The
end
My favorite part was when Superman flew all the Jews out of Egypt. (Glaring at Joey who’s nodding.

The Armadillo was actually not so thrilled about that part! Okay Ben, it’s time to light the Hanukkah candles! (Santa, Superman, Monica, Ben, and the Holiday Armadillo go over to the menorah to light the candles.

(seeing the collection of characters.) Wow! It looks like the Easter
Bunny’s funeral in here
Come on, come on, we’re-we’re-we’re lighting the candles

lines.Character: (They both go over to light the candles
lines.Line: They both go over to light the candles.
Okay, I understand why Superman is here, but why is there a porcupine at the Easter Bunny’s funeral
